dark.$description: Primary brand color - deep charcoal. Use for: body text on light, dark section backgrounds, primary UI elements.

beige.$description: Warm paper background. Tattoo sketch paper aesthetic. Use for: main page background, card surfaces, light sections.

red.$description: Accent red - the ink that demands attention. Bold, authentic. Use for: CTAs, link hovers, active states, accent borders.

white.$description: Pure white. High contrast. Use for: text on dark backgrounds, card dividers, clean accents.

headline.$description: Display font for all headings. Bold, distinctive, tattoo-industry appropriate. Use for: H1-H3, section titles, CTA text.

body.$description: Clean body text. Professional, readable. Use for: paragraphs, captions, form labels.

section.$description: Vertical padding between major page sections (80px). Creates breathing room.

component.$description: Internal component padding (24px). Standard card/button padding.

element.$description: Small gaps between elements (16px). Tight spacing for related items.

micro.$description: Micro spacing (8px) for inline elements, tight grouping.

soft.$description: Subtle elevation for cards at rest.

medium.$description: Hover state for cards, active elements.

duration-normal.$description: Standard transitions - card hovers, button clicks

duration-slow.$description: Dramatic transitions - page load animations, reveals

easing-bounce.$description: Playful bounce - use sparingly for primary CTAs
